4. (Implied) Organizing Committee for the Olympic Games Sydney 2000 (OCOG): Responsible for planning and executing the Olympic Games in Sydney in 1996.
5. (Implied) Australian Olympic Committee (AOC): Represented Australia in the Olympic Games held in Sydney in 1996.
